info.name: Darklingo++
info.description: Hey! üëãüèΩ Darklingo++ is a delightful switch on the default Duolingo UI. This style presents you with a Dark Mode, the ability to change the Theme Color , and it makes both leagues and the scrollbar optional. (More to come in the future) If you find anything that isn't themed correctly, feel free to tell me; feedback is always welcome! üòÅ And if you really like this style or any of my others, you can donate (only if you want to ü§ó).
